titles.title: Well, I Wouldn't Take Nothing For My Journey Now

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Well, I wouldn't take nothing for my journey now
I'm going to make it to heaven some how
Even though the devil tempts me and he tries to turn me around.
Well he's offered everything that's got a name
All the wealth I want and the worldly fame.
If I could, still I wouldn't take nothing for my journey now.
